title: Major League Cricket to move headquarters from San Francisco to Grand Prairie
body:
Unless you’re a hardcore fan, you probably had no idea that Grand Prairie had its own Major League Cricket team, the Texas Super Kings.

Well believe it or not, Grand Prairie has become the hub for Major League Cricket in the U.S., so much so that Major League Cricket announced they will soon be moving their headquarters from San Francisco to North Texas!

In a press conference, Grand Prairie mayor Ron Jensen said, “We are thrilled Major League Cricket has decided to bring its full-time headquarters to our city.

“To move your headquarters here from California, that's a big deal.”

According to GPTX.com, Grand Prairie Cricket Stadium, formerly known as the home of the Grand Prairie Airhogs, will host 12 regular-season MLC matches in the league's third season, along with the playoffs and the final.

Johnny Grave, CEO of Major League Cricket, said, “We’re delighted to continue making Grand Prairie the home of Cognizant Major League Cricket.

"In addition to hosting 12 regular-season games, we are excited to bring the Playoffs back to Grand Prairie and look forward to another sold-out Championship Final on July 13th.”
summary: The Major League Cricket (MLC) tournament has chosen Grand Prairie, Texas as its new hub, moving its headquarters from San Francisco. The Grand Prairie Cricket Stadium will host 12 regular-season matches, playoffs, and the final in the league's third season. The championship final is scheduled for July 13th and is expected to be a sold-out event.

title: Dolphins upgrade Slade van Staden, Nqobani Mokoena contracts
body:
The Dolphins have upgraded the contracts of batsman Slade van Staden and seamer Nqobani Mokoena for the 2025-26 domestic season in South Africa.

Van Staden and Mokoena were previously on high performance contracts. They have been upgraded to full contracts.

Mokoena played for South Africa Emerging earlier this year. Van Staden has played for MI New York in Major League Cricket in the United States of America.

Proteas cricketers Sarel Erwee and Daryn Dupavillon won’t be contracted by the Dolphins this year. Erwee has retired from professional cricket, while Dupavillon has moved to the Tuskers.

JOIN our Whatsapp channel for more SA cricket news

Other contracting news

The Lions have upgraded batsman Richard Seletswane to a full contract.

Seletswane’s Lions team-mate Tiaan Brits has also been upgraded to a full contract. They previously had high performance contracts.

The Lions have signed former Warriors seamers Beyers Swanepoel and Siya Plaatjie – and Proteas spinner Bjorn Fortuin – on full contracts. Fortuin recently lost a Cricket South Africa contract.

The Warriors, meanwhile, have upgraded seamer CJ King to a full contract – and given Zimbabwe first-class cricketer Jordan Morris a high performance contract.

Elsewhere in division one, the Tuskers have given a high performance contract to South Africa Under-19 captain Muhammad Bulbulia.

In division two, Border have given all-rounder Lihle Sizani a full contract, too.

MORE LATEST SA cricket news
summary: * Slade van Staden has played for MI New York in Major League Cricket in the United States of America. No other information is provided about the tournament.

title: Golden State Grizzlies names Arunkumar Jagadeesh as head coach
body:
The Golden State Grizzlies, a professional cricket franchise based in the San Francisco Bay Area, has appointed Indian coach Arunkumar Jagadeesh, as the new head coach of the franchise.

Jagadeesh, a former India cricketer, currently serves as assistant batting coach for Mumbai Indians in the Indian Premier League (IPL) and batting coach for MI New York in Major League Cricket (MLC).

Also read: Samir Shah named CEO of Golden State Grizzlies

He brings extensive coaching experience at the international and domestic levels, including prior stints with the USA Men’s National Team, Kings XI Punjab, Kerala Knights, and Karnataka—where he led the state team to multiple domestic championships.

“Jak brings the perfect blend of tactical acumen, international exposure, and a deep commitment to player development,” said Samir Shah, CEO of the Golden State Grizzlies.

“His presence instantly elevates our cricketing standards and supports our mission to build a world-class franchise rooted in youth talent, high-performance coaching, and strong community values.”

For Jagadeesh, the move is also personal. “The Bay Area, California was my first home when I began coaching in the U.S., so taking on this role feels like returning to where it all started. I’m excited to lead the Golden State Grizzlies—there is real talent and passion here. Together, we’ll build a competitive, disciplined, and united team that represents the best of what American cricket can become.”

His appointment reinforces the Grizzlies’ long-term strategy to invest in elite coaching and youth development. Jagadeesh will guide the franchise into the 2025 season with a strong emphasis on professionalism, discipline, and high-performance culture.

title: Play for free on LitGamez
body:
Step Into the Action with City Cricket

Introduction

Welcome to City Cricket, the ultimate American cricket game experience designed to bring the fast-paced excitement of the pitch to your screen. Perfect for fans of Cricket Games USA, this game captures the energy of real-world matches with easy-to-learn controls and thrilling gameplay. Whether you're a fan of Major League Cricket or just discovering the sport, City Cricket is your gateway to fun, strategy, and nonstop action. You can find more games like this in our Sports Games category.

Overview

City Cricket stands out among the top online cricket games in the United States, offering a realistic yet accessible cricket simulator for players of all skill levels. Built to reflect the growth of cricket in the USA, especially with the rise of Major League Cricket, this game provides multiple modes including casual matches, full tournaments, and global multiplayer options. With smooth mechanics and vibrant visuals, it's a top-tier choice for those seeking an HTML5 cricket game that works across devices without downloads.

How to Play

Select your squad and enter a city-based cricket match.

Bat, bowl, and field using intuitive touch or mouse controls.

Compete in quick play or tournaments, climbing leaderboards against global players.

Key Features

Built with responsive HTML5 game technology for fast, lag-free play.

Designed as a cricket game for PC and mobile – no downloads required.

Multiplayer mode for competitive matches with players across the USA and beyond.

Inspired by the style and gameplay of real Major League Cricket tournaments.

Conclusion
summary:
* The article mentions the rise of Major League Cricket in the USA, inspiring the development of City Cricket game.
* The game is designed to reflect the growth of cricket in the USA, especially with the rise of Major League Cricket.
* The game is inspired by the style and gameplay of real Major League Cricket tournaments.

Note: There is no specific information about the format, schedule, teams participating, or any other specific information about the tournament in the article.
